column4: How do I install proprietary drivers for my VGA (onboard Intel 845)
Also: take a step back (when talking on the other channel) and explain _why_ you want to do that.

It's like: you're trying to cook a cake, and so you go and ask "how do I set my flamethrower to 350 degrees?"  when really you should explain what you're doing and people will gently suggest you use an oven instead...
